problem_text_cn: 如图,△ABC中,∠BAC=30°,△ABC绕点A逆时针旋转至△AED,连接对应点CD,AE垂直平分CD于点F,则旋转角度是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, ∠BAC = N_0, △ABC rotates counterclockwise around point A to △AED, connects the corresponding point CD, AE vertically bisects CD at point F, then the rotation angle is ()
raw_answer: ∵△ABC绕点A逆时针旋转至△AED,∠BAC=30°,∴AD=AC,∠DAE=∠BAC=30°∵AE垂直平分CD于点F,∴∠DAE=∠CAE=30°∴∠DAC=30°+30°=60°即旋转角度数是60°故选:D.
raw_comment: 本题考查了等腰三角形的性质和旋转的性质,能求出∠DAE=∠CAE=30°是解此题的关键.
